content.p: Most of the information for current students can be found on Moodle. Moodle is an internal site for students to access information such as the school student handbook, module guides, assessment and exchange information, etc. You can also view the university webpages for current students. Our placements and employability programme helps provide valuable work experience and internship opportunities. In the School of Politics and International Relations, students and staff work together to improve the student experience. The Peer Mentoring scheme is offered by the school to all year one students in order to assist them with the transition from school to university. Law and Social Sciences building University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD
